Forest Quality is a research and development company aimed at facilitating the evaluation of wood quality and improving the value of
the standing tree. Based in southern Tasmania, Australia, we provide the following services

-   Web-based processing of resistance drill traces taken using the IML PD series power drills

-   NIR analysis for the prediction of pulp yield and density in eucalypt samples

-   Analysis and reporting services of wood quality assessments
